{"id":875630590,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1673374958,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"14 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/875630590/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"19.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int trapped = 0;\n        int n = height.size();\n        int maxLeft = height[0];\n        int maxRight = height[n-1];\n\n        int left=0, right=n-1;\n\n        while(left <= right) {\n            if(height[left] <= height[right]) {\n                if(maxLeft <= height[left]) maxLeft = height[left];\n                else trapped += maxLeft - height[left];\n                left++;\n            }\n\n            else {\n                if(maxRight <= height[right]) maxRight = height[right];\n                else trapped += maxRight - height[right];\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        return trapped;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false}
